body: You snipe quickly, making it harder for others to find the location of your attack.
name: Kobold Sniper
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Kobolds/New Racial Rules/Kobold Feats/Kobold Sniper

sections.body: When you are sniping, you only take a –10 penalty on your Stealth checks to stay hidden.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: You take a –20 penalty on your Stealth check to maintain your obscured location while sniping.
sections.name: Normal
